testcase.name: Check the successful sending of the insurance email with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the trincentis website.................................passed When he fills in the form on the “Enter Vehicle Data” tab and press next....passed And he fills in the form on the “Enter Insurant Data” tab and press next....passed And he fills in the form on the “Enter Product Data” tab and press next.....passed And he fills in the form on the “Select Price Option” tab and press next....passed And he fills in the form on the “Send Quote” tab and press send.............passed Then he checks the message “Sending email successfully!” on the screen......passed
